quote: Sunshine is delicious, rain is refreshing, wind braces us up, snow is exhilarating
author: John Ruskin (Cyrus)

quote: I don't mind the weather as long as I have my coffee.
author: Unknown (Kim)

quote: Why does it always rain on me? Is it because I lied when I was seventeen?
author: Travis (Edmund)

quote: I love the rain. It's my favorite weather.
author: Kristen Wiig (Joan)

quote: The weather is like a government. Always in the wrong.
author: Jerome K. Jerome (Jummel)

quote: There is no such thing as bad weather, only inappropriate clothing.
author: Ranulph Fiennes (Ivan)

quote: The coldest winter I ever spent was a summer in San Francisco
author: Mark Twain (Jan)
